Language.Text:
Rama pauses for a long time, and when he speaks it is in a whisper:
"When I became a man, I went to see a monk about my future. He told me that I was destined to die on a journey to the Core."
And then, Rama laughs and dispatches the rest of his drink.
"But I no longer fear my destiny. I will go with you!"
As you get up to leave, Rama grabs your arm and says, "Perhaps we will see each other again."

You talk to Rama, a silver-haired pilot who seems to be wearing blaster armor under his flight-suit.
You trade stories about flying and fighting, but when you mention your journey to the Core, he grows quiet and stares off into space.

Rama talks about his ship instead:
"I've made a lot of modifications to her over the years. You should see her in a fight: fast and tight as a lightship, but heavily armed.
"She's saved my life a hundred times."

(if kills (setq theList (append theList (list (list "Kills by Rama" kills (typTranslate &unidCommonText; 'autonsAndWingmen) 4)) )) )
theList )
